text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://projectronin.com/fhir/us/ronin/ValueSet/ed-visit-risk-driver-codes-vs
  • Include these codes as defined in http://projectronin.com/ds/patientComparison
    CodeDisplay
    OCOverall Comparison
    PCTPatient Cancer Type(s)

name: EDVisitPatientComparisonCodesVS
title: ED Visit Patient Comparison Codes ValueSet
description: Contains all Risk Driver codes and additional patient comparison specific codes
